  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:merli.xtec.cat:merli/867</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>MERLI</catalog>
            <entry>merli/867</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="ca">L'aparell digestiu</string>
            <string language="en">The digestive system</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Das Verdauungssystem</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Le système digestif</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">O sistema digestivo</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Il sistema digestivo</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Το χωνευτικό σύστημα</string>
          </title>
          <language>ca</language>
          <description>
            <string language="ca">Miniunitat didàctica (MUD) interactiva sobre l'aparell digestiu i els tipus d'aliments. Conté una activitat  d'autoavaluació sobre les parts de l'aparell digestiu i una proposta de treball per identificar els plats d'una dieta equilibrada.</string>
            <string language="en">Interactive mini teaching unit (MUD) on the digestive system and types of food. It includes a self-assessment exercise on the parts of the digestive system and an activity in which the pupil must identify the different dishes that make up a balanced diet.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">aliment</string>
            <string language="en">food</string>
            <string language="es">alimento</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">ciències de la naturalesa</string>
            <string language="en">natural sciences</string>
            <string language="es">ciencias de la naturaleza</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">educació alimentària</string>
            <string language="en">nutrition education</string>
            <string language="es">educación alimentaria</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Interaktive unterrichtende Minimaßeinheit 
(SCHLAMM) auf dem Verdauungssystem und den Typen der Nahrung. 
Sie schließt eine Selbstbewertung Übung auf den Teilen des 
Verdauungssystems und der Aktivität ein, in denen die Pupille die 
unterschiedlichen Teller kennzeichnen muß, die eine ausgewogene Diät
bilden.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Mini unité d'enseignement interactive (BOUE) sur
le système digestif et les types de nourriture. Elle inclut un 
exercice de art de l'auto-portrait-assessment sur les parties du système digestif 
et d'une activité dans lesquels la pupille doit identifier les 
différents plats qui composent un régime équilibré.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Unidade ensinando mini interativa (LAMA) no 
sistema digestivo e nos tipos de alimento. Inclui um exercício 
do self-assessment nas partes do sistema digestivo e de uma atividade 
em que a pupila deve identificar os pratos diferentes que fazem acima 
uma dieta equilibrada.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Mini unità d'istruzione interattiva (FANGO) sul 
sistema digestivo e sui tipi di alimenti. Include 
un'esercitazione di valutazione di se stesso sulle parti del sistema 
digestivo e di un'attività in cui la pupilla deve identificare i 
piatti differenti che compongono una dieta equilibrata.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Διαλογική μίνι μονάδα διδασκαλίας (ΛΑΣΠΗ) στο 
χωνευτικούς σύστημα και τους τύπους τροφίμων. Περιλαμβάνει 
μια άσκηση αυτοαξιολόγησης στα μέρη του χωνευτικού συστήματος και
μιας δραστηριότητας στα οποία ο μαθητής πρέπει να προσδιορίσει τα
διαφορετικά πιάτα που αποτελούν μια ισορροπημένη διατροφή.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Nahrung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">natürliche Wissenschaften</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Ernährungsausbildung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">nourriture</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">les sciences normales</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">enseignment de la nutrition</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">alimento</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">ciências naturais</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">instrução de nutrition</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">alimento</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">scienze naturali</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">educazione alimentare</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">τρόφιμα</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">φυσικές επιστήμες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">εκπαίδευση διατροφής</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
